title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 8: Specificity — Point Construction & Patterns
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Integrate serve+1, return patterns, directional control at match pace.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: Serve+1 pattern ladder: deuce/ad variations 6x6 each

notes: Week 1: broken point scenarios. Week 2: set‑play simulations with scoring.
